title: SyncWindow contains the kind, time, duration and attributes that are used to assign the syncWindows to apps

andOperator.title: UseAndOperator use AND operator for matching applications, namespaces and clusters instead of the default OR operator

applications.title: Applications contains a list of applications that the window will apply to

clusters.title: Clusters contains a list of clusters that the window will apply to

duration.title: Duration is the amount of time the sync window will be open

kind.title: Kind defines if the window allows or blocks syncs

manualSync.title: ManualSync enables manual syncs when they would otherwise be blocked

namespaces.title: Namespaces contains a list of namespaces that the window will apply to

schedule.title: Schedule is the time the window will begin, specified in cron format

timeZone.title: TimeZone of the sync that will be applied to the schedule
